In a universe where The Avengers are all together and everyone is...
caption: It’s magic, baby - 5 (on Wattpad) https://my.w.tt/o1ZRXYlhHU In a universe where The Avengers are all together and everyone is still alive, a new old face comes along. She has created an image for herself and trying to explain who she really is, proves to be quite difficult. Especially when her own brother is Tony Stark. Trying to reshape your image is difficult in the public eye.

title:
My Spidey 
(Tom!Peter x Reader)
body:
PART 1

Summary: Having admired Peter from afar for long enough, you decide to take the bold decision and ask him out.

Warnings: Uhh none. (Not yet XD).

***

“Peter!” you yell, catching up to him in the hallway. Thankfully, Ned wasn’t with him.

Peter turns around and looks at you, confused. Well you can’t blame the boy; you hardly ever spoke to him. Well you’ve had enough of pining after him.

“Ummm… I was wondering if… What are you doing on Monday?”

“I’ve got the… I’ve got the Stark internship.”

“On Monday? Is Tony Stark going to be there?” you asked, laying out your trap.

“Uh.. yes, yeah, he is.” You smirked. He fell right into it.

“Hmmm. Except Tony’s going to the Met Gala on Monday.”

“Yeah.. But.. Uh he-”

“Peter, are you okay? You’ve been avoiding everything for like a year now.”

“I’m fine.”

“Mmkay… Well since you’re free on Monday, I was thinking we could go for dinner or something. You know, go get Chinese.”

“Or Thai,” he said unthinkingly. The full impact of your words hadn’t hit him yet.

“Wait a minute. Are you.. Are you asking me out <Y/N>?” 

“Maybe… So is that a yes?”

“I… yeah. Yes.”

“Cool! I’ll text you,” you said, waking backwards.

“You don’t even have my number.”

“Don’t I?” 

As you walked away silently cheering to yourself, you could hear Peter exclaim in disbelief.

They are tagged under Avengers: Endgame spoilers and Avengers: Endgame - My Masterlist - https://all-things-marvel-related.tumblr.com/post/184043672905/my-masterlist - List of Marvel Characters I write for - https://all-things-marvel-related.tumblr.com/characters - My multiple part Prompt List - https://all-things-marvel-related.tumblr.com/prompt-list - REQUESTS ARE OPEN!!!!!!!

summary: Dating Bucky Barnes/The Winter Soldier/White Wolf would include...
title: Dating Bucky Barnes/The Winter Soldier/White Wolf would include...
body:
(Picture and gif are not mine!!!!!! I just searched for a Picture and a Gif of Bucky Barnes and ^^ are the ones I chose to use!!!!!!)

  • The 2 of you met when he was the Winter Soldier and you were a HYDRA agent, and you were assigned to help him assassinate Nick Fury.
  • When the Washington D.C. Incident happened you knew that he had recognized Steve from his life before he was the Winter Soldier.
  • After the fall of HYDRA and SHIELD you went into hiding, not intending to run into the ex-Winter Soldier.

You moved to Bucharest intending to live a whole new life. But then you’re life changed forever when you spotted him across the farmer’s market… You knew it was him… The long brown hair, muscular build, and the crystal blue eyes. As you were staring at him he looked up as if sensing that someone was watching him. When his eyes met yours, his eyes widened in surprise. You quickly turned away and continued shopping.
As you continue shopping you know that he’s following you. You stop at a fruit stand and look at the fruits in front of you. The woman at the stand speaks Romanian and you smile at her before responding. “Cât de mult pentru mere?” (Yes. How much for the apples?) “Două.” The woman responds. (Two.) You nod. “Bine, dă-mi … opt.” (Alright, give me… eight.) you say while getting out your wallet to purchase the apples. You give the woman the money and decide to head home. You look around for the soldier but don’t see him anywhere.
As you pass an alley near your apartment building a hand grabs your arm and pulls you into the alley. You try to scream but a gloved hand covers your mouth. “Don’t scream.” a male voice says from behind you. You stiffen as you recognize the voice. “I’m not going to hurt you.” the voice continues. You move your head against the gloved hand that’s covering your mouth and he removes it. “What the hell are you doing?” you ask him. “What do you mean ‘What am I doing?’ What are you doing? Are you following me?” he asks you. “No! Why would I be following you?” you ask. “HYDRA.” he simply answers. “I haven’t done anything to do with HYDRA since Washington D.C.” you say as you get out of his grip. “Oh…, sorry.” he says softly. “It’s alright.” you say with a small smile. “It’s always better to be safe than sorry.” you continue which makes him nod in agreement.

  • After that you and Bucky (As you learned from him as you got to know more about him) moved in together since both of you thought it would be safer if the authorities came for either of you there would be another person there to protect the other.
  • During the time the 2 of you had gotten to know each other the both of you started to develop feelings for one another.
  • Than the attack in Vienna happened… You knew it wasn’t Bucky since he was in Bucharest with you, but you knew it was only a matter of time before someone found out where he was, and you swore on your life you would protect him no matter what.
  • At the UK Headquarters building (I don’t remember what the building was called since I haven’t watched Civil War in forever…) when Bucky went into Winter Soldier mode, you tried to make him snap out of it and for a moment you could’ve sworn he almost broke out of it as you were fighting against him…
  • During the Civil War between the Avengers you stayed by Bucky’s side and did your best to protect him. (Especially from T’Challa)
  • After the whole ordeal with The Avengers and The Accords you went with Steve and Bucky to Wakanda since T’Challa had offered to cure him.

You stare at Bucky as he sits on the examination table. His metal arm gone as the result of the battle dealing with The Avengers and The Accords. Steve told you what had happened in Siberia and you can’t help but feel bad for Tony Stark since he had just found out that both of his parents were murdered instead of being in a car crash like he had thought…
You feel eyes on you, which makes you look up at Bucky again to see him staring at you. You slowly walk up to him and smile softly at him as you take his hand in yours. “Are you sure you want to do this?” you ask softly. He nods. “I can’t trust my own mind (Y/N). All the stuff HYDRA put in me is still in there… It’s for the best.” he says softly as he gives your hand a squeeze. You smile softly at him before leaning forward and pressing a quick kiss on his cheek. You pull back to see him looking at you in shock and with bright red cheeks. You giggle slightly at his face before he grabs the back of your head bringing your face down to his, meeting your lips with his in a passionate kiss. You stand there in shock for a few seconds before your body relaxes and you kiss him back.
He slowly pulls away a minute later so that you can catch your breath. He stares into your eyes and smiles softly before the doctors start examining him again.

  • Then it came time for him to go under cyro.

You restrained yourself from begging him to not do this but you knew it was for the best.
You watched beside Steve as Bucky’s eyes close and the glass is covered in a thin layer of ice, signaling that he was frozen. “He’s going to be alright, (Y/N).” Steve says making you turn to him. “I know.” you say with a small smile even though your heart is aching for him.

  • You staying in Wakanda until Bucky wakes up.
  • You giving him a big ol’ kiss when he wakes up from being in cyro.
  • You becoming best friends with Shuri since she lets you visit him when she’s working with him.
  • You being relieved when he says that all of the things that HYDRA had put in his head is gone.
  • Him watching you sleep and thinking of how lucky he is to have you and you doing the same.
  • You comforting him whenever he has nightmares about when he was The Winter Soldier.

“It’s alright Buck, they can’t get to you here. Your safe now.”

  • Possessive Bucky.

“You’re mine!”

  • Jealous Bucky.

Whenever he sees another guy flirting with you, he tries to restrain himself from marching over to you and literally showing the guy that you belong to him, and him only. But he stays put since he knows that you can take care of yourself just fine. But as soon as he considers that the guy thinks he has his chances with you, he shows up next to you, placing his arm around your waist, kisses your cheek and says something like “Who’s this, doll?”

  • Both worshipping each other’s bodies.

“You’re so beautiful…”

  • Shirtless Bucky!!!! (I couldn’t find a good picture😟)
  • Saying “I love you’s” multiple times through the day
  • Always making the other smile
  • Rough sex.
  • Make up sex.
  • Gentle sex.
  • Taking pictures of him so you can look at them while he’s away on a mission.
  • Him not wanting you to leave the bed in the morning.

“But… doll. Stay in bed with me for a little longer. Work can wait.”

  • Loving the other like crazy!
  • Stealing his shirts.
  • Constantly touching each other.
  • Lots, and I mean lots of cuddles.
  • Him getting shy and blushing when you kiss his cheek in public but he’s always asking for attention and affection when the 2 of you are alone.
  • You tracing the scar that separates his flesh from his metal arm before bed as he closes his eyes.
  • Reminding him several times that he doesn’t have to be jealous because you’re all his.
  • “You’re my mission tonight.”
  • Him thinking that you’re an angel that needs to be protected at all costs.
  • Morning sex.
  • Showering together which leads to quickies.
  • Letting him touch and braid your hair when he anxious about something.
  • Massaging his muscular back when he comes back from a mission.
  • Him tightening his embrace around your waist whenever you move a little during the night because he’s afraid that you might leave him one day which leads to you caressing his hand and whisper: “I’m not going anywhere, baby… Never.”
  • Him snuggling his face in your neck and hugging you by behind when you’re cooking.
  • Extreme sexual tension when you’re arguing.
  • Him usually smirking when he would get a kiss on the cheek or lips from you when you’re both home alone.
  • Him reaching to hold your hand whenever he needs to feel you close to him and you gladly letting him.
  • Him protecting you from anyone who tries to hurt you and having no mercy when you would happen to have gotten hurt.
  • Him feeling so relaxed and comfortable when you would stroke his hair as he would lay his head on your lap, whenever you both spend the day home doing nothing.
  • Him trying his best to be romantic and surprising you with little gifts on random occasions.
  • Him telling you that he loves you with all his heart as you would take care of him from his injuries.
  • PDA isn’t really his thing, but when he is around his friends or people he is comfortable with he would be constantly touching you, holding hands, his thumb sliding over your hand slowly, soft kisses, cheek kisses, wrapping his arm around you so your body is pressed up against his, etc.
  • Bucky always hugs you from behind, wrapping an arm around your waist and using the other to tilt your chin back to kiss you.
  • Holding him close when he wakes up from a nightmare.
  • Falling asleep in his arms, almost on top of him when you’ve both had a bad day.
  • Cuddling in bed while watching movies.
  • Sweet and slow kisses.
  • Passionate kisses.
  • Your first time together was very gentle and slow because he was still afraid to hurt you.
  • After that, he wouldn’t be as scared because you’d reassure him a lot that he won’t hurt you.
  • He’d love to just hold you.
  • Pet names.

You - “Sweetheart.” “Doll.”
Bucky - “Buck.” “Sarge.”

  • Moving into an apartment together.
  • He would always tell you that you’re the best thing to ever happen to him.
  • “I love you.”

“I love you too.”

  • Being each other’s everything.

“You’re my everything.”
“And you’re mine.”

  • Always supporting and being there for each other.
  • Helping him remember his life before he was The Winter Soldier.
  • He would looooove to carry you everywhere.
  • He would have a thing for twirling your hair in his fingers.
  • He would love having his arms around you.
  • Holding hands (he would be insecure about the metal hand at first but you would assure him you didn’t mind the cold, because you loved him).
  • Passionate kisses when you’re alone.
  • Stolen glances when you’re with the other Avengers.
  • Lingering touches.
  • Loving stares (the love in his eyes when he looks at you is just undeniable).
  • You always telling him that everything that he did as the Winter Soldier was not him.

“I’ve done horrible things. you don’t need to be with me, doll…”
“James, it wasn’t you.”

  • You’re the only one who can call him James.
  • “I’m so lucky to have you’s” and “I don’t deserve you’s" from the both of you.
  • Lots of sex: rough, hard sex, angry sex for when the two of you are mad/jealous/just need a release, makeup sex after petty arguments, shower sex, car sex, etc.
  • You calling him ‘Soldier’ to turn him on ;)

“Why don’t you come over here and make me, Soldier.”

  • When he has flashbacks of his time at HYDRA he gets afraid when you touch his left arm because he doesn’t want to hurt you.
  • When you fall asleep on the couch of the common room in the Avengers Tower he’ll pick you up bridal style and carry you to your room.
  • Occasionally walking in on him as he struts around shirtless.
  • Calling him ‘James’ when he’s making you moan.
  • Slow passionate sex.
  • Quickies before missions.
  • Having to cover up your hickeys with makeup.
  • When the team finds out that you and Bucky are together Tony immediately says. “I knew you two were getting it on.”
  • Lazy good morning kisses.
  • Semi possessive hugs.
  • Visiting vintage cafés and restaurants together.
  • Calling him ‘sergeant’
  • Being Steve’s BFF.
  • Lots of tiny, cute, and random gifts.
  • Never going on missions unless you’re together, because you need to make sure you’re both safe.
  • Drinking coffee together, and having one another’s orders perfectly memorized.
  • Scary movies.
  • Sharing your deepest secrets.
  • Sometimes, in the middle of the night, you’re both lying awake in bed because of the nightmares.

You’re always the first to move; you lay your head on his chest and listen to his heartbeat.
He hugs you after a while and you both drift off; it’s pure bliss.

  • Sneaking pictures of him when he’s not paying attention.
  • Being the center of his attention.
  • Being Bucky’s absolute best friend, no matter what.
  • Both of you hating when he has to go away on missions.

“I miss you so much when you leave…”
“I know doll, I miss you too, but I’ll be back before you know it.”

  • Steve telling you that he hasn’t seen Bucky this happy in a very long time.
  • Wearing his shirts and sweaters often because they’re just so warm and cozy.
  • Training together.
  • Him telling you about his family and how much they would’ve loved you.
  • Bucky would never call you by your first name, it’d always be doll or baby doll.
  • Sometimes he’d just cry about all his past pain and life with HYDRA and he’d love it when you’d sit with him through his moments and play with his hair.
  • When you’d hold hands you’d sometimes play with his fingers, seeing as they’re so much bigger than yours.
  • He is very overprotective of you even though you can take care of yourself.
  • He is scared of hurting you because of what HYDRA did to him.
  • Being the first person he sees when he wakes up in Wakanda.
  • Chaste kisses.
  • Showers after missions.
  • Tracing your fingers along his scars.
  • Loving the feeling of his metal fingers teasing you.
  • He hates when you go on missions alone.
  • Comforting him in the night when he has nightmares.
  • “What did I ever do in my life to deserve you?”
  • He runs his hands through you hair while memorizing every detail of you.
  • Steve teasing him about the way he looks at you.
  • Playing old music and slow dancing when you are alone.
  • His kisses being slow, deep and long.
  • Bucky whispering cute things in your ear whenever he can.
  • Holding hands, every single time that you’re both together.
  • Bucky always smiling at you from across the room.
  • Not being scared of him.
  • Having to remind him that there was nothing he could do to fight against whatever HYDRA did to him.

“It wasn’t your fault Buck… You had no choice…”

  • Him loving the way you say his name. (Especially when you moan ;))
  • Him using cheesy pickup lines on you and blushing when you start to laugh because IT’S SO CUTE!
  • Taking baths with him.
  • Kissing and massaging the part of his body where his shoulder meets his metal arm.
  • Giggling all the time when you’re alone with him.
  • Bucky always worrying about you when he’s away on a mission.
  • Pretty much because he doesn’t like the idea of you being alone (Even though you’re never actually alone).
  • On your first date, you went out for dinner and a walk.
  • He said ’I love you’ first.
  • Daddy kink.
  • When he lays his head on your lap, you play with his hair until he falls asleep.
  • Cuddling while you force him to watch classic movies from all the decades he missed and him watching you instead of the movies.
  • Bucky getting butterflies every time you laugh at something funny and his heart feeling achy when you start tearing up at anything emotional.
  • Reminding him he is not his past every time you feel him pulling away.
  • Holding him tight and refusing to let go whenever he’s becoming reclusive.
  • Long nights when Bucky stays awake, stroking your hair and mumbling sweet nothings while you sleep on his chest.
  • His cocky little smirk that makes your stomach do flips.
  • Wrestling matches that quickly leads to make out sessions.
  • Kissing… a lot of it. Tender, slow, hard, fast, against the wall, on the couch, cuddling, fighting, angry, sweet… You name it. It’s happened.
  • Never leaving one another without saying ‘I love you’ regardless of how angry, anxious, pissy, or sad either of you are.
  • Plums.
  • Living for those tiny glimpses of his smile.
  • Being the reason for that smile.

(Gif is not mine!!!!! And when I was searching for a gif of him smiling ^ was the best one I could find since Bucky doesn’t really smile much… Link)

  • Falling in love with his accent.

“You’re lookin gorgeous darlin.”

  • Listening to Steve tell embarrassing stories about when Bucky was young.
  • Taking care of each other.
  • Calming him down when he gets worked up.
  • “You make me happy.”
  • Falling asleep in each other’s arms.
  • Butt grabs.
  • Convincing the world he’s not the monster everyone thought him to be.
  • Training with him almost always leads to a steamy make out session.
  • If anything happened, whether it was someone hitting on you or something happening during a battle, he’d wrap you in a protective hold and not let you go until you were 100% alright.
  • Taking care of his injuries when he returns from missions.
  • Sex here, sex there, sex everywhere!
  • Him always feeling the need to have his hands on you, whether it’s as simple as holding your hand or him wrapping his arm around your shoulder/waist, he just wants to feel you close to him.
  • The two of you trusting each other more than anything.
  • He’s the best kisser and no doubt knows it too. He’s so good that he sometimes has to hold you up by the waist when he plants one on you because your knees physically buckle under you.

“Careful, sweetheart, can’t have my girl fallin’ all over me, now can I?”

  • He can be so cocky sometimes, and it drives you absolutely crazy.

“Bucky Barnes you wipe that stupid smirk off your face or I’ll-”
“Or you’ll what, darlin’?”

  • Nose kisses. so many nose kisses.
  • You’re his girl, he’d do absolutely anything to see that gorgeous smile on your face. flowers, spontaneous dates, you name it, he’s probably done it just to see you happy.

One time there was a knock on your bedroom door. You went to the door expecting to see someone standing at the other side of the door but what you found was a box laying on the ground in front of your door. You look down the hallway to see if anyone else was in the hallway but there was no one but you.
When you opened the box there was a beautiful (f/c) swing dress folded neatly inside with a note placed on top of it.

’Be ready by 8:15.
Put this dress on and wear your dancing shoes.
B’

You grinned in happiness as you went back inside of your room to get yourself all dolled up.
When you had put on the dress you could tell that it had 40’s flare to it, you also knew that Bucky would be gob smacked when he sees you wearing it.
When 8:15 arrived, you heard a knock on your door. You smiled as you walked up to the door opening it to see Bucky who was holding a single rose in his hand. His jaw literally dropped to the floor at the sight of you in the dress. “Close your mouth before you catch flies, Barnes.” you say with a smirk. Your comment made him laugh, a blush appearing on his cheeks. Then was your turn to admire him. He really does clean up good.
He took you out dancing at an old club in Brooklyn, and the 2 of you danced the whole night away. You had never had so much fun in your life.

One time there was a knock on your bedroom door. You went to the door expecting to see someone standing at the other side of the door but what you found was a box laying on the ground in front of your door. You look down the hallway to see if anyone else was in the hallway but there was no one but you.
When you opened the box there was a beautiful (f/c) swing dress folded neatly inside with a note placed on top of it.

’Be ready by 8:15.
Put this dress on and wear your dancing shoes.
B’

You grinned in happiness as you went back inside of your room to get yourself all dolled up.
When you had put on the dress you could tell that it had 40’s flare to it, you also knew that Bucky would be gob smacked when he sees you wearing it.
When 8:15 arrived, you heard a knock on your door. You smiled as you walked up to the door opening it to see Bucky who was holding a single rose in his hand. His jaw literally dropped to the floor at the sight of you in the dress. “Close your mouth before you catch flies, Barnes.” you say with a smirk. Your comment made him laugh, a blush appearing on his cheeks. Then was your turn to admire him. He really does clean up good.
He took you out dancing at an old club in Brooklyn, and the 2 of you danced the whole night away. You had never had so much fun in your life.

  • The 2 of you met when he was the Winter Soldier and you were a HYDRA agent, and you were assigned to help him assassinate Nick Fury.
  • When the Washington D.C. Incident happened you knew that he had recognized Steve from his life before he was the Winter Soldier.
  • After the fall of HYDRA and SHIELD you went into hiding, not intending to run into the ex-Winter Soldier.

You moved to Bucharest intending to live a whole new life. But then you’re life changed forever when you spotted him across the farmer’s market… You knew it was him… The long brown hair, muscular build, and the crystal blue eyes. As you were staring at him he looked up as if sensing that someone was watching him. When his eyes met yours, his eyes widened in surprise. You quickly turned away and continued shopping.
As you continue shopping you know that he’s following you. You stop at a fruit stand and look at the fruits in front of you. The woman at the stand speaks Romanian and you smile at her before responding. “Cât de mult pentru mere?” (Yes. How much for the apples?) “Două.” The woman responds. (Two.) You nod. “Bine, dă-mi … opt.” (Alright, give me… eight.) you say while getting out your wallet to purchase the apples. You give the woman the money and decide to head home. You look around for the soldier but don’t see him anywhere.
As you pass an alley near your apartment building a hand grabs your arm and pulls you into the alley. You try to scream but a gloved hand covers your mouth. “Don’t scream.” a male voice says from behind you. You stiffen as you recognize the voice. “I’m not going to hurt you.” the voice continues. You move your head against the gloved hand that’s covering your mouth and he removes it. “What the hell are you doing?” you ask him. “What do you mean ‘What am I doing?’ What are you doing? Are you following me?” he asks you. “No! Why would I be following you?” you ask. “HYDRA.” he simply answers. “I haven’t done anything to do with HYDRA since Washington D.C.” you say as you get out of his grip. “Oh…, sorry.” he says softly. “It’s alright.” you say with a small smile. “It’s always better to be safe than sorry.” you continue which makes him nod in agreement.

  • After that you and Bucky (As you learned from him as you got to know more about him) moved in together since both of you thought it would be safer if the authorities came for either of you there would be another person there to protect the other.
  • During the time the 2 of you had gotten to know each other the both of you started to develop feelings for one another.
  • Than the attack in Vienna happened… You knew it wasn’t Bucky since he was in Bucharest with you, but you knew it was only a matter of time before someone found out where he was, and you swore on your life you would protect him no matter what.
  • At the UK Headquarters building (I don’t remember what the building was called since I haven’t watched Civil War in forever…) when Bucky went into Winter Soldier mode, you tried to make him snap out of it and for a moment you could’ve sworn he almost broke out of it as you were fighting against him…
  • During the Civil War between the Avengers you stayed by Bucky’s side and did your best to protect him. (Especially from T’Challa)
  • After the whole ordeal with The Avengers and The Accords you went with Steve and Bucky to Wakanda since T’Challa had offered to cure him.
[[MORE]]

You stare at Bucky as he sits on the examination table. His metal arm gone as the result of the battle dealing with The Avengers and The Accords. Steve told you what had happened in Siberia and you can’t help but feel bad for Tony Stark since he had just found out that both of his parents were murdered instead of being in a car crash like he had thought…
You feel eyes on you, which makes you look up at Bucky again to see him staring at you. You slowly walk up to him and smile softly at him as you take his hand in yours. “Are you sure you want to do this?” you ask softly. He nods. “I can’t trust my own mind (Y/N). All the stuff HYDRA put in me is still in there… It’s for the best.” he says softly as he gives your hand a squeeze. You smile softly at him before leaning forward and pressing a quick kiss on his cheek. You pull back to see him looking at you in shock and with bright red cheeks. You giggle slightly at his face before he grabs the back of your head bringing your face down to his, meeting your lips with his in a passionate kiss. You stand there in shock for a few seconds before your body relaxes and you kiss him back.
He slowly pulls away a minute later so that you can catch your breath. He stares into your eyes and smiles softly before the doctors start examining him again.

One time there was a knock on your bedroom door. You went to the door expecting to see someone standing at the other side of the door but what you found was a box laying on the ground in front of your door. You look down the hallway to see if anyone else was in the hallway but there was no one but you.
When you opened the box there was a beautiful (f/c) swing dress folded neatly inside with a note placed on top of it.

’Be ready by 8:15.
Put this dress on and wear your dancing shoes.
B’

You grinned in happiness as you went back inside of your room to get yourself all dolled up.
When you had put on the dress you could tell that it had 40’s flare to it, you also knew that Bucky would be gob smacked when he sees you wearing it.
When 8:15 arrived, you heard a knock on your door. You smiled as you walked up to the door opening it to see Bucky who was holding a single rose in his hand. His jaw literally dropped to the floor at the sight of you in the dress. “Close your mouth before you catch flies, Barnes.” you say with a smirk. Your comment made him laugh, a blush appearing on his cheeks. Then was your turn to admire him. He really does clean up good.
He took you out dancing at an old club in Brooklyn, and the 2 of you danced the whole night away. You had never had so much fun in your life.

You moved to Bucharest intending to live a whole new life. But then you’re life changed forever when you spotted him across the farmer’s market… You knew it was him… The long brown hair, muscular build, and the crystal blue eyes. As you were staring at him he looked up as if sensing that someone was watching him. When his eyes met yours, his eyes widened in surprise. You quickly turned away and continued shopping.
As you continue shopping you know that he’s following you. You stop at a fruit stand and look at the fruits in front of you. The woman at the stand speaks Romanian and you smile at her before responding. “Cât de mult pentru mere?” (Yes. How much for the apples?) “Două.” The woman responds. (Two.) You nod. “Bine, dă-mi … opt.” (Alright, give me… eight.) you say while getting out your wallet to purchase the apples. You give the woman the money and decide to head home. You look around for the soldier but don’t see him anywhere.
As you pass an alley near your apartment building a hand grabs your arm and pulls you into the alley. You try to scream but a gloved hand covers your mouth. “Don’t scream.” a male voice says from behind you. You stiffen as you recognize the voice. “I’m not going to hurt you.” the voice continues. You move your head against the gloved hand that’s covering your mouth and he removes it. “What the hell are you doing?” you ask him. “What do you mean ‘What am I doing?’ What are you doing? Are you following me?” he asks you. “No! Why would I be following you?” you ask. “HYDRA.” he simply answers. “I haven’t done anything to do with HYDRA since Washington D.C.” you say as you get out of his grip. “Oh…, sorry.” he says softly. “It’s alright.” you say with a small smile. “It’s always better to be safe than sorry.” you continue which makes him nod in agreement.

  • After that you and Bucky (As you learned from him as you got to know more about him) moved in together since both of you thought it would be safer if the authorities came for either of you there would be another person there to protect the other.
  • During the time the 2 of you had gotten to know each other the both of you started to develop feelings for one another.
  • Than the attack in Vienna happened… You knew it wasn’t Bucky since he was in Bucharest with you, but you knew it was only a matter of time before someone found out where he was, and you swore on your life you would protect him no matter what.
  • At the UK Headquarters building (I don’t remember what the building was called since I haven’t watched Civil War in forever…) when Bucky went into Winter Soldier mode, you tried to make him snap out of it and for a moment you could’ve sworn he almost broke out of it as you were fighting against him…
  • During the Civil War between the Avengers you stayed by Bucky’s side and did your best to protect him. (Especially from T’Challa)
  • After the whole ordeal with The Avengers and The Accords you went with Steve and Bucky to Wakanda since T’Challa had offered to cure him.

You stare at Bucky as he sits on the examination table. His metal arm gone as the result of the battle dealing with The Avengers and The Accords. Steve told you what had happened in Siberia and you can’t help but feel bad for Tony Stark since he had just found out that both of his parents were murdered instead of being in a car crash like he had thought…
You feel eyes on you, which makes you look up at Bucky again to see him staring at you. You slowly walk up to him and smile softly at him as you take his hand in yours. “Are you sure you want to do this?” you ask softly. He nods. “I can’t trust my own mind (Y/N). All the stuff HYDRA put in me is still in there… It’s for the best.” he says softly as he gives your hand a squeeze. You smile softly at him before leaning forward and pressing a quick kiss on his cheek. You pull back to see him looking at you in shock and with bright red cheeks. You giggle slightly at his face before he grabs the back of your head bringing your face down to his, meeting your lips with his in a passionate kiss. You stand there in shock for a few seconds before your body relaxes and you kiss him back.
He slowly pulls away a minute later so that you can catch your breath. He stares into your eyes and smiles softly before the doctors start examining him again.

  • Then it came time for him to go under cyro.

You restrained yourself from begging him to not do this but you knew it was for the best.
You watched beside Steve as Bucky’s eyes close and the glass is covered in a thin layer of ice, signaling that he was frozen. “He’s going to be alright, (Y/N).” Steve says making you turn to him. “I know.” you say with a small smile even though your heart is aching for him.
